verses.verse: I cry <S%H2199><s%> with my voice <S%H6963><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> With my voice, <S%H6963><s%> I ask Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> for mercy. <S%H2603><s%>
I pour out <S%H8210><s%> my complaint <S%H7879><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him. <S%H5046><s%> I tell him <S%H6440><s%> my troubles. <S%H6869><s%>

When my spirit <S%H7307><s%> was overwhelmed <S%H5848><s%> within me, <S%H3045><s%> you knew my path. <S%H5410><s%> In the way <S%H734><s%> in which <S%H2098><s%> I walk, <S%H1980><s%> they have hidden <S%H2934><s%> a snare for me. <S%H6341><s%>

Look <S%H5027><s%> on my right, <S%H3225><s%> and see; <S%H7200><s%> for there is no one who is concerned <S%H5234><s%> for me. <S%H4498><s%> Refuge has fled <S%H6><s%> from me. <S%H1875><s%> No one cares for my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
I cried <S%H2199><s%> to you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh. I said, <S%H559><s%> "You are my refuge, <S%H4268><s%> my portion <S%H2506><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living. <S%H2416><s%>"

Listen <S%H7181><s%> to my cry, <S%H7440><s%> for I am <S%H1809><s%> in desperate <S%H3966><s%> need. <S%H1809><s%> deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from my persecutors, <S%H7291><s%> For they are stronger than me. <S%H553><s%>

Bring <S%H3318><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> out of prison, <S%H4525><s%> that I may give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to your name. <S%H8034><s%> The righteous <S%H6662><s%> will surround <S%H3803><s%> me, <S%H1580><s%> for you will be good to me.
